name: NewsBlur - Flat & Clean
description:
No gradient backgrounds, no UPPERCASE sentences, clean and easy-to-read fonts and buttons, smaller unread counters, removed unnecessary text, added Google icons.

Just check the screenshots, test the style for yourself and come back to give your feedback, suggestions are also appreciated. :)
additional_info:
Tested on Chrome and Firefox under Ubuntu 14.04. Created by Paulo Schilling (facebook/pauloschilling - g+/pauloschilling - @pauloschilling) Icons made by Google from www.flaticon.com are licensed under CC BY 3.0 CHANGELOG: 
Version 0.2.5  | 2014-12-01 | Updated screenshots.
Version 0.2.5  | 2014-10-25 | More icons, menus.
Version 0.2.4  | 2014-10-20 | More icons, menus.
Version 0.2.3  | 2014-10-19 | More icons, menus.
Version 0.2.2  | 2014-10-19 | Icons, alignment.
Version 0.2.1  | 2014-08-27 | Fixed story actions (share and save). Removed OpenSans.
Version 0.2.0  | 2014-08-27 | Fixed list view mode. (Thanks +SviataslauLohinau for reporting :)
Version 0.1.9  | 2014-08-02 | Themed training modal window and some other elements.
Version 0.1.8  | 2014-07-28 | Themed tag manager that shows up when saving a story.
Version 0.1.7  | 2014-07-28 | Fixed selected folder and feed background.
Version 0.1.6  | 2014-07-28 | Fixed feed list alignments and removed more gradient backgrounds.
Version 0.1.5  | 2014-07-27 | Icons! :) (best viewed using Chrome)
